comments.comment:
Gotabaya is a robber, murderer and a thug.
Anyone who ever held dual citizenship should never become Sri Lanka‚Äôs leader. That means at any stage of his or her life they have surrendered Sri Lankan citizenship in order to get the other. Later they get it back at anytime paying money to Sri Lanka 
Once left citizen is not worth for leadership 
People live on robberies, thuggery and unlawful govt commissions want him badly. This is Sri Lanka.
Fuck off for anyone who supports him, they are simply public enemies
I would support even for a minority group leader either Tamil or Muslim, who has never traded Sri Lankan citizenship and call Sri Lanka is their one and only country. How can someone who has entire family live in USA as citizen can become the head of state in Sri Lanka? Has it ever happen I. Sri Lanka or anywhere in the world? Imagine if this is in India, would he ever get a chance? Even Sonia Ghandi, became an Indian by marriage never contested for top seat voluntarily.
